pages.text: A potion first made by the dryads of Brokilon to boost vigor, Maribor Forest will provide the following effects:$(li)$(l)Instant Food$(): 10 Points$(li)$(l)Slight Saturation Boost$()$(li)$(l:potions/toxicity#page_toxicity)$(2)$(l)[Toxicity]$(): +20%

pages.title: Recipe (shapeless)
pages.text: Ingredients: $(l:crafting/alcohest#page_alcohest)Alcohest$() x1, Glass Bottle x1, Cake x1, Honey Bottle x1.
